title: To the Store
description: To the Store is a fictional book about a little girl named Katie who loves to shop. The familiar settings, repeated sentence patterns, and strong picture support ensure students' reading success.
highFrequencyWords: a, for, go, goes, her, she, the, to, with
reviewWords: book, bookstore, clothing, coat, food, grandfather, grandmother, pet, shoes, shop, toy
phonics: Consonant Blends : Identify initial and final consonant st-blends
grammar: Capitalization and Punctuation                : Capitalize sentence beginnings and punctuate sentence endings
